page.title: 05HOUSING
page.content: groups close to the actual farm so that the farm labourers could easily walk to work. However many of the{farm cottages}have become derelict as fewer farm workers are needed with the technological advancement and usage of farm machinery. With the development of the{oil {industry}in Aberdeenshire and also with the development of other industries in the area many people have moved to the countryside to live within{commuting}distance of their work yet away from the troubles of urban life.So,{rural repopulation}has occurred. The new houses are built with{bricks}and have{fabricated tiles on the roofs.They also have chimneys but coal fires are only a secondary
